# Setting specific rules

## Lore points

Lore points are awarded for exploring locations and vanquishing mighty foes. Lore points can be spent in three ways:

* to level up your Character
* to re-Roll a failed Roll
* to purchase Gear set items 

## Gear sets

To purchase Gear sets you must find the seller and become friendly with their people. If you equip 3 or more items in a Gear set you receive that set's bonus. 

Each piece of gear also grants bonus Actions or Abilities.

### Rangers of Ithilien

Set bonus - Deal double Damage if attacking from stealth.

Shroud of Osgiliath

* When attacking with a bow, you can make two [Attacks](../core_rules_game/index.qmd#attacks)
* Dexterity + 2

Ithilien cloak

* If not already seen, use this Ability to meld into your surroundings
* Dexterity + 2
* Strength + 2

Tunic of the White Tree

* Whenver you slay a target with a ranged Attack, you may immediately make and additional Attack, ranged or melee. 
* Dexterity + 1
* Strength + 1
* Will + 1

Numenorean Roots Boots

* You will never get lost when navigating.
* HP + 3

Bracers of Denethor

* When making a melee Attack, make a bonus unarmed (d4) melee Attack
* Strength + 1
* HP + 2
